What's going on in this workflow?

on: pull_request
Triggers when a PR is opened or updated (not on push to main).

permissions
Explicitly grants write access to PR comments. Without this, the workflow can't post comments.

jobs
A workflow is composed of one or more jobs. Each job runs independently and can be executed on a different runner (virtual machine). In your workflow, you have one job named 'review'.

steps
A job is a sequence of steps. Each step can either run a command (like pip install) or run an action (like 'actions/checkout@v4').
